channel.title: Music around the world
channel.description:
This series, hosted by Marta Nicholas, presents music from all parts of the globe.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Children's music
item.description: This program focuses on children's music from around the world.
item.dc:creator: Nicholas, Marta
item.dc:subject: International music

item.description: This program focuses on various music from around the world.

item.description: This program focuses on the relationship between religion and music, as heard in songs from around the world.
